channel.title: Blog on Webpage of Mathias Fleury
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Webpage of Mathias Fleury

item.title: Blog
item.description: Artifacts Reviewing I have consistently felt unease about our approach to examining artifacts. Although I have personally reviewed numerous artifacts, I believe that, as a community, we are mistaken in our methods. Weird Errors The objective of artifact creation is straightforward: to enable the reproducibility of results by allowing the same code to be run again in the future. This can be achieved by packaging all necessary components in a repository, such as Zenodo, ensuring that everything is self-contained and does not rely on external internet connections.
